headers.User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:147.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/147.0

response.body: Damn Vulnerable Web Application (DVWA)

messages: Warning. Pattern match "^(?!.*(?:\\/wp-admin\\/|(?:^|\\/)(index|xmlrpc|wp-cron|wp-login)\\.php$)).*\\.php$" at REQUEST_FILENAME. [file "/etc/modsecurity.d/apps/wordpress/wordpress-hardening-before.conf"] [line "223"] [id "9522200"] [msg "Wordpress hardening: attempt to access php files other than index.php"] [data "Request Filename /login.php"] [severity "NOTICE"] [ver "WPHARD/1.0.0"] [maturity "1"] [accuracy "9"] [tag "wordpress"] [tag "direct-access"] [tag "paranoia-level/1"]

Warning. Operator GE matched 5 at TX:blocking_inbound_anomaly_score. [file "/etc/modsecurity.d/crs_rules/REQUEST-949-BLOCKING-EVALUATION.conf"] [line "233"] [id "949110"] [msg "Inbound Anomaly Score Exceeded (Total Score: 5)"] [ver "OWASP_CRS/4.22.0"] [tag "anomaly-evaluation"] [tag "OWASP_CRS"]

Warning. Unconditional match in SecAction. [file "/etc/modsecurity.d/crs_rules/RESPONSE-980-CORRELATION.conf"] [line "98"] [id "980170"] [msg "Anomaly Scores: (Inbound Scores: blocking=5, detection=5, per_pl=5-0-0-0, threshold=5) - (Outbound Scores: blocking=0, detection=0, per_pl=0-0-0-0, threshold=4) - (SQLI=0, XSS=0, RFI=0, LFI=0, RCE=0, PHPI=0, HTTP=0, SESS=0, COMBINED_SCORE=5)"] [ver "OWASP_CRS/4.22.0"] [tag "reporting"] [tag "OWASP_CRS"]
Audit log: Global mutex was not created

rules.unparsed: SecRule "&TX:allowed_http_versions" "@eq 0" "phase:1,auditlog,id:901163,pass,nolog,tag:OWASP_CRS,ver:OWASP_CRS/4.22.0,setvar:'tx.allowed_http_versions=HTTP/1.0 HTTP/1.1 HTTP/2 HTTP/2.0 HTTP/3 HTTP/3.0'"

SecRule "REQUEST_METHOD" "@rx ^(?:GET|HEAD)$" "phase:1,log,auditlog,id:920170,block,t:none,msg:'GET or HEAD Request with Body Content',logdata:%{MATCHED_VAR},tag:application-multi,tag:language-multi,tag:platform-multi,tag:attack-protocol,tag:paranoia-level/1,tag:OWASP_CRS,tag:OWASP_CRS/PROTOCOL-ENFORCEMENT,tag:capec/1000/210/272,ver:OWASP_CRS/4.22.0,severity:CRITICAL,chain"
